attributes.review: I downloaded this application in seek for good laugh after viewing numerous Tik Toks about surveys that were supposedly made  Donald J. Trump. However, after close inspection, I have come to conclude that this app contains â€œfake newsâ€. For one, the website is most certainly NOT made by the president. Due to his lack of intelligence and mental capacity, anybody can see that he clearly does not know how to read, let alone write. Secondly, the loading screen promises that Trump will â€œkeep america greatâ€. While this sounds like a perfect plan, my life under Trumps presidency has been anything but great. This morning, for example, i noticed a small crack in my ceiling while eating a peanut butter and mustard salad. I climbed up my sterling silver ladder to realize that there was a dancing mouse inside of the hole. As expected, I climbed throw the hole and ended up back in the same spot just to realize that my other mother had already prepared the buttons. I started to briskly walk (as I had injured my legs falling out of a moving plane on the way to Wawa) and she crawled after me chanting â€œHAVE YOU EVER BEEN SNAKED BY A FRIENDâ€. While strutting away, I fell through a steep cliff ended up painting my nails on the leaning tower of pizza. Needless to say, I ended up in the back of the SM6 family band van and never saw my poodle ever again. Make America Great Again? Idk about you but none of this ever happened under Obama ğŸ¤·‍â™€ï¸. In summary, this application is the equivalent to scooter ankle on legos while stubbing your toe. 10/10 would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: DO NOT BUY THIS APP
